name_abbreviation: Pennsylvania Department of Banking v. NCAS of Delaware, LLC.

pin_cites.parenthetical: "It is well settled that when the courts of this Commonwealth are faced with interpreting statutory language, they afford great deference to the interpretation rendered by the administrative agency overseeing the implementation of such legislation."
